Scripts_Options.ScriptVBS: Argument = Split(WScript.Arguments(0),":") Action = Split(Argument(1),"?",2) ResultVariable = Action(0) ResultValue = Action(1) Set objShell = CreateObject("WScript.Shell") Set objEnv = objShell.Environment("USER") objEnv(ResultVariable) = ResultValue

UI_Messages_ES.RestartPrompt_SaveMessage: Por favor, guarde todo su trabajo y reinicie el equipo dentro del tiempo asignado.
UI_Messages_ES.InstallationPrompt_AttributionTextDismis: Puede descartar este mensaje cuando quiera.

UI_Messages_CZ.WelcomePrompt_CloseMessagePlural: The following {0} running applications must be closed before and during the process:
UI_Messages_CZ.WelcomePrompt_DeferMessage: You can defer the {0} to another time...
UI_Messages_CZ.WelcomePrompt_DeferMessageDeadlineWarnin: Once this period has expired, you will not be able to postpone the {0}.
UI_Messages_CZ.BlockExecution_CloseMessage: The following application must stay closed during the {0} process:
UI_Messages_CZ.BlockExecution_BlockMessageSingular: The execution of this application has been temporarily blocked, when the {0} process ends it can be used again normally.
UI_Messages_CZ.BlockExecution_BlockMessagePlural: The execution of these {0} applications has been temporarily blocked, when the {1} process ends, they can be used again normally:
UI_Messages_CZ.RestartPrompt_RestartMessage: For the process to complete, the computer needs to be restarted.
UI_Messages_CZ.RestartPrompt_AutoRestartMessage: The device will automatically reboot at the end of the countdown.
UI_Messages_CZ.RestartPrompt_SaveMessage: Please, save all your work and restart your computer within the allotted time.
UI_Messages_CZ.InstallationPrompt_AttributionTextDismis: You can dismiss this message at any time.
